review: Originally, I was going to get My Aple TV until a friend of mine told me the Roku 3500 streaming stick would work for me and the types of movies/tv shows I want to see. He said My Apple TV is "overkill" for what I I wanted. Needless to say it was like $42.00 versus the Apple product for $99. The Roku lets me stream Net Flix, Amazon, and much, much, more.
author: tiffany

review: I just got the roku streaming stick about 3 days ago. And I'm noticing I get a random black screen. Blackscreen can appear when I'm watch qvc app, when I wake up in the morning etc. I would have to take out the electricity in order to get it back going. I chatting online at support, and then called the toll free number but no one know why I'm having this issue. Is anyone else having this problem with the streaming stick ?**** update ****So I figured out the problem with the black screen, it was my outlet that was the issue not the roku.Also I got in upgrade which dives me the ability to mirror my phone. Now I don't have to purchase a google Chromecast.Very happy now with the roku, after the update I can now mirror on my nexus 5 and have a few more channels I'm interested in now too.No hesitation with giving the roku streaming stick 5 stars.
